references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational technique used in TEXGen for generating high-resolution texture maps.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models, which is leveraged by TEXGen for high-quality texture generation.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a model that learns transferable visual models from natural language supervision, providing TEXGen with image and text understanding capabilities.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A Universe of Annotated 3D Objects
references.reason: This paper introduces Objaverse, a large-scale dataset of 3D objects used in TEXGen for training and evaluation, enabling the model's generalization capabilities.
This paper introduces ShapeNet, a dataset of 3D models that was likely used as a data source for TEXGen, contributing to the model's comprehensive understanding of 3D shapes.
